thread.title: BRIEF-National Oilwell Varco Q1 Loss Per Share $0.18

title: BRIEF-National Oilwell Varco Q1 Loss Per Share $0.18
text:
April 26 (Reuters) - National Oilwell Varco Inc:
* NATIONAL OILWELL VARCO REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2018 RESULTS
* Q1 LOSS PER SHARE $0.18 * Q1 REVENUE $1.8 BILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $1.87 BILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.05 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* BACKLOG FOR CAPITAL EQUIPMENT ORDERS FOR COMPLETION & PRODUCTION SOLUTIONS AT MARCH 31, 2018 WAS $1.01 BILLION
* BACKLOG FOR CAPITAL EQUIPMENT ORDERS FOR COMPLETION & PRODUCTION SOLUTIONS AT MARCH 31, 2018 WAS $1.01 BILLION
* BACKLOG FOR CAPITAL EQUIPMENT ORDERS FOR RIG TECHNOLOGIES AT MARCH 31, 2018 WAS $2.05 BILLION
* COMPLETION & PRODUCTION NEW ORDERS IN QUARTER WERE $324 MILLION
* NATIONAL OILWELL VARCO- NEW ORDERS FOR RIG TECHNOLOGIES BOOKED DURING QUARTER $201 MILLION COMPARED TO $153 MILLION SHIPPED FROM BACKLOG Source text for Eikon:
